name: ShoopSwitch
commands: len([skill for skill in unit.skills if skill.nid == 'BloodlustStack']) == 5
len([skill for skill in unit2.skills if skill.nid == 'BloodlustStack']) == 5
source:
if;len([skill for skill in unit.skills if skill.nid == 'BloodlustStack']) == 5
    change_portrait;Shoop;ShoopFeral
elif;len([skill for skill in unit2.skills if skill.nid == 'BloodlustStack']) == 5
    change_portrait;Shoop;ShoopFeral
end
